name: Write in Secrecy
description: A style which hides text for basic and older versions of popular webmail clients.
additional_info: This version of Write in Secrecy is for people using older mail clients. This style is designed to hide text on AOL Basic, GMail old composer, Yahoo! Mail classic and Hotmail (moved from Write in Secrecy 2). If you have no immediate need for using basic clients, then this isn't the style for you; Check out Write in Secrecy 2 instead. While Luckymouse this time didn't help out, I still give him props here because He helped me on the original I made, before I decided to really learn DOMi and get to grips with its interface. Tips to ensure this style works to the best of its ability: * Make text/hidden objects visible when nobody is looking * Send plain text only -- No attachments or downloads that will alter the screen * QUICKLY correct spelling errors. * Occasionally do something else, and disable the mouse when away. I am bound to encounter other bugs and glitches, so feel free to leave comments suggesting improvements! While you can, PLEASE do not use this style for acts of evil and harm.
